action.action-desc: Mr. Khanna (for himself, Ms. Norton, Ms. Tlaib, Mrs. Lawrence, Mr. Carson, Mr. Bowman, Mr. García of Illinois, Mr. Jones, Ms. Schakowsky, Ms. Ocasio-Cortez, Ms. Lee of California, Mrs. Hayes, Mrs. Watson Coleman, Mr. Levin of Michigan, Ms. Pressley, Ms. Bush, and Ms. Omar) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Commodity Exchange Act to prohibit trading of water and water rights for future delivery, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Future of Water Act of 2022.

section.header: Prohibition of trading in water and water rights for future delivery

subsection.text: Section 1a(9) of the Commodity Exchange Act (7 U.S.C. 1a(9)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking (7 U.S.C. 13–1)) and and inserting (7 U.S.C. 13–1)),;
by inserting water or water rights (or any index, measure, value, or data related to water or water rights), and after receipts), and; and
by striking receipts) in which and inserting receipts, and water or water rights, or any index, measure, value, or data related to water or water rights) in which.

subsection.text: The first section of Public Law 85–839 (7 U.S.C. 13–1) is amended in the first sentence of subsection (a)—

paragraph.text: by inserting water or water rights (or any index, measure, value, or data related to water or water rights), after sale of; and
by striking receipts) and inserting receipts),.
